channel.title: Section Rules
channel.description:
Welcome to the client hacking section. Please abide by the following rules:
[ul][li]Topics related to the modification of a client's background are not welcome.[/li]
[li]Request topics do not belong here; if you're looking for help then please use the Client Help section, which can be found [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,138.0.html]here[/url].[/li]
[li]Topics related to the recoloring of in-game items are not to be posted here.[/li]
[li]Don't post tutorials here that would not be accepted if they were posted in the tutorial section.[/li]
[li]Topics relating to Interfaces are only acceptable within [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,408153.0.html]this[/url] thread [/li][/ul]
If you are looking to use your client as a webclient, please use the tutorial posted in client help: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,535370.0.html]Webclient Tutorial Multi Revision/ Base Support[/url]

item.title: Section Rules
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

Welcome to the client hacking section. Please abide by the following rules:

[ul][li]Topics related to the modification of a client’s background are not welcome.[/li]

[li]Request topics do not belong here; if you’re looking for help then please use the Client Help section, which can be found here.[/li]

[li]Topics related to the recoloring of in-game items are not to be posted here.[/li]

[li]Don’t post tutorials here that would not be accepted if they were posted in the tutorial section.[/li]

[li]Topics relating to Interfaces are only acceptable within this thread [/li][/ul]

If you are looking to use your client as a webclient, please use the tutorial posted in client help: Webclient Tutorial Multi Revision/ Base Support

Read full topic
